game_description: You became a warrior who was called by the goddess to protect the shrine of water. As evening approaches, monsters aiming for the Shrine of Water appear. Warrior! Pass 6 ordeals to protect the shrine of water from monsters. And become a legendary warrior who protects the shrine of water and protects the goddess by killing monsters! Also, Be the greatest warrior in a breathtaking 1v1 battle with other warriors in the arena of Archery Land.
